titleStmt.title: England new bell-man: ringing into all peoples ears Gods dreadful judgements against this land and kingdom prognosticated by the great eclipse of the sun. March 29. 1652. the strange effects to continue 1654, 1655, 1656. to the amazement of the whole world. The tune is, O man in desperation.

England new bell-man: ringing into all peoples ears Gods dreadful judgements against this land and kingdom prognosticated by the great eclipse of the sun. March 29. 1652. the strange effects to continue 1654, 1655, 1656. to the amazement of the whole world. The tune is, O man in desperation.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a range of dates: 1658-1664.
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives the title: England's new bell-man.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
